attributes.action: ensure that Subway creates the option of 9" subs to add to its 6" and 12" ranges to satisfy consumer demand
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We, as members of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland, have come to the seemingly
obvious conclusion that the limited range of Subway sandwiches should be
extended to include 9” bread.
 
6 inches is simply too small, while 12 inches is often too big.
 
But then there will be wastage, I hear you say. Nut NO. If you bake two
options, a 12” and a 9” option, not only do you broaden your range for
customers, as if they would like a 6 incher, you simply cut the 12” bread in
half. 

Simple.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
